Question
========
Daan studies the effect of the number of care hours per week on the perceived stress. Among other things, he is investigating whether this relationship is different for men than for women. What method of analysis can he best use?

Answerlist
----------
* Linear regression, to test the moderation effect of gender
* Linear regression, to test the moderation effect of gender
* Linear regression testing whether gender is a spurious variable
* Linear regression, to test the mediation effect of the number of hours of care testing

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
